body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Patrick Allen and the customer's name is Ann Flores.  The conversation is about Meta4 (a Jewellery Store ) and is a conversation about customer service.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, my name is Patrick Allen, and I am here to assist you from Meta4, your premier jewellery store. How can I help you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Patrick, I'm Ann Flores. I'm feeling a bit frustrated with my recent order.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that, Ann. Could you please tell me what seems to be the problem with your order?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I received the wrong item, and it was supposed to be a gift for my daughter.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I apologize for the inconvenience, Ann. We want to ensure you get what you ordered. Can I have your order number to look into this?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's one two three four five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that. One two three four five. I appreciate it. Now, could you also provide me with your email address so I can update you on the progress?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Ann. I have your email as ann.flores@email.com. I will check on your order right away.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, Patrick. I hope we can resolve this quickly.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: We will do our best, Ann. Thank you for your patience, and I will be in touch shortly with an update. Have a great day!
